definition: to pester someone again and again

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: Therefore, we always pester for lard.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们总是死乞白赖地讨猪油。

sentences.english: You do not need to pester him. We can succeed without him.
sentences.chinese: 你不用死乞白赖地求他，没有他我们照样能成功。

sentences.english: You don't need to pester him. We can succeed without him.
sentences.chinese: 你不用死乞白赖地求他，没有他我们照样能成功。

definition: variant of 死乞白賴|死乞白赖[si3 qi5 bai2 lai4]
to know no shame/to be totally shameless
to lose money instead of being paid (i.e. sb should pay me, but is actually taking my money)
to have no sense of shame
lit. to beg grandpa and call on grandma (idiom)/fig. to go about begging for help
pinyin: qiu2 ye2 ye5 gao4 nai3 nai5

definition: to look displeased/to not be afraid of hurting sb's feelings/to put aside one's pride
